description: A college jock /GQ fantasy come true - pitting a stunning MichaelSoldier opposite hearthrob Jack Ryan. Set in a beautiful kitchen (theyare making a fruit bowl as the scene begins), these two head turnerssuck and fuck each other in multiple positions as the Raging Stallioncameras follow every nasty nuance. This is beautiful sex beautifullyfilmed - some of the finest work Raging Stallion has everproduced. A must see for fans of classic, high-end erotica.
title: Terms Of Endowment, Scene #02
